languages.text: "Любого замыслившего зло против Амик'Абеляра должно предать смерти. Казнь да научит подданных, как следует обращаться с первым советником Домин".

traits.locale_text: "Любого замыслившего зло против Амик'Абеляра должно предать смерти. Казнь да научит подданных, как следует обращаться с первым советником Домин".

languages.text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
languages.original_text: "Любого замыслившего зло против Амик'Абеляра должно предать смерти. Казнь да научит подданных, как следует обращаться с первым советником Домин".

traits.locale_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: «Quienquiera que conspire contra Amic'Abelard merece la muerte. Que su ejecución enseñe a estos vasallos a tratar como es debido al primer consejero de{mf|l| la} Domin».
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: 「家令長さんに対して謀反を企てる者は、死刑にしなければなりません。彼らを処刑することで、ドミンの第一の助言者がどう扱われるべきかを、この臣民どもに知らしめてやりましょう」
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: “所有打算谋害信者阿贝拉德的人都必须处死。让这些人的脑袋成为其他贵族的教训，让他们明白该如何对待秘者的首席顾问。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: "Wer gegen Amic'Abelard intrigiert, muss sterben. Möge ihre Exekution diese Vasallen lehren, wie der erste Berater {mf|des|der} Domin zu behandeln ist."
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: « Quiconque complote contre Amic'Abélard doit être mis à mort. Que l'exécution serve de leçon à ces vassaux et leur apprenne à traiter le premier conseiller {mf|du|de la} Domin avec tout le respect qui lui est dû. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
"Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."

languages.text: "Amic'Abelard'a karşı komplo kuran herkes ölüme mahkûm edilmeli. İnfazları bu kölelere Domin'in en kıdemli danışmanına nasıl davranılması gerektiğine dair bir ders olsun."
languages.original_text: "Anyone plotting against Amic'Abelard must be put to death. Let their execution teach these vassals how the Domin's first advisor is to be treated."
